name: Far East economy
description:
New board simulation game 《Far East Tycoon》 released!
Landmarks and buildings in Korea, Japan, Hong Kong, Taiwan and China
City management simulation / board game.

- Collect landmarks of East Asian Far Eastern countries.
- Decorate a beautiful island.
- Make money and build a house.
- When you work for a resident, your house will be upgraded.
- Create a company to get people to work.
- Increase the number of tourists by creating landmarks.
- Creating a hotel will allow tourists to stay in the city for longer.
- Build a port and an airport to increase population in the city.
